{"id":522756718,"lang":"java","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1626321632,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/522756718/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int numSquares(int n) {\n//         int a=(int)Math.sqrt(n);\n//         if(a*a==n)return 1;\n        \n//         if(n<=3)return n;\n        //0 -> 0 No perfect square possible\n        //1 -> 1^2\n        // 2 -> 1^2+1^2\n        //3 -> 1^2+1^2+1^2\n        \n        \n        //Maximum number of perfect squares to get sum==n will be n\n        \n        return helper(n);\n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    private int helper(int n)\n    {\n        int a=(int)Math.sqrt(n);\n        if(a*a==n)return 1;\n        \n        if(n<=3)return n;\n        int ans=Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        for(int i=1;i*i<=n;i++)\n        {\n            ans=Math.min(ans,helper(n-i*i));\n        }\n        return ans+1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
